overview: The Last Night is a Thriller Film Which unfolds a Mystery to reveal and every character has their own dark secrets . Watch the film till end to know about the mystery.  Directed by : Supratik Ganguly DOP : Supratik Ganguly Editor : Marie Louise Gouws Story,Dialogues and Screenplay: Supratik Ganguly  Cast : Marie Louise Gouws as Amy Mirinda Melville as Amanda Claudia Charisse Melville as Dr. Stacey Anthony Melville as Bob Selene Meneguin as Detective Rachael Juan - Luke Melville as James The Serial Killer (V.O) Alex Gouws as Officer Mathew
title: The Last Night
